bibl.title: Cleopatra Reassessed.
bibl.note: Colloquium in the context of the exhibition Cleopatra of Egypt: from History to Myth, London, June 2001. - 19 papers in 4 sections: Cleopatra and Egypt; - Cleopatra and the Hellenistic Greek Tradition; - Cleopatra and Rome; - Cleopatra Abroad. - Pp. v-vi: S.W. and S.-A.A., Introduction; - 139-146: Bibliography.
bibl.seg: WALKER Susan and Sally-Ann ASHTON (Edd.), Cleopatra Reassessed. (The British Museum Occasional Paper. 103.)
London, British Museum Press, 2003, 4Â°, vi-148 pp., figg., cartes, plans. ISBN 0-86-159-1038.

Colloquium in the context of the exhibition Cleopatra of Egypt: from History to Myth, London, June 2001. - 19 papers in 4 sections: Cleopatra and Egypt; - Cleopatra and the Hellenistic Greek Tradition; - Cleopatra and Rome; - Cleopatra Abroad. - Pp. v-vi: S.W. and S.-A.A., Introduction; - 139-146: Bibliography.
